participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, always putting family first.
participant_1.background: i drive a mini van. i have five sons. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. coffee is my preferred beverage.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and imaginative, often lost in her own world.
participant_2.background: i don't have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.
